body:
So basically was wondering if it would ever be possible to have filtering in place where instead of filtering an entire guild I could filter posts that posted with a certain domain, such as foxnews.com or something.

The purpose here would be to ignore posts that had potentially bias/unreliable Information on them via the "known unreliable" domain. 

I guess this could be solved with some type of "string filtering" feature, that would probably provide more flexibility too. 

Just some thoughts, thanks!
body_html:
So basically was wondering if it would ever be possible to have filtering in place where instead of filtering an entire guild I could filter posts that posted with a certain domain, such as foxnews.com or something.

The purpose here would be to ignore posts that had potentially bias/unreliable Information on them via the "known unreliable" domain.

I guess this could be solved with some type of "string filtering" feature, that would probably provide more flexibility too.

Just some thoughts, thanks!
title: Feature that allows you to filter a post based on a certain domain used?

body: I don't know why you're getting downvoted. This could actually be a very useful feature.

post.title: Feature that allows you to filter a post based on a certain domain used?

body: Lol that would be redundant, if I clicked on a post I would then see the URL and just not go to it... The purpose of this would be to avoid seeing the post in the first place. Another use case could be if a bot was spamming content from the same domain but from different accounts.
body_html: Lol that would be redundant, if I clicked on a post I would then see the URL and just not go to it... The purpose of this would be to avoid seeing the post in the first place. Another use case could be if a bot was spamming content from the same domain but from different accounts.
